DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate follow topic : - Determine accuracy ApneaLink Plus separate Apneas Obstructive Apneas , Mixed Apneas Central Apneas . - Determine accuracy ApneaLink Plus score Hypopneas accord 2008 guideline AASM = American Academy Sleep Medcine . - Determine whether patient start stop recorder able attach additional effort sensor use patient instruction sheet
DOC.detailed_description: - Determine accuracy ApneaLink Plus separate Apneas Obstructive Apneas , Mixed Apneas Central Apneas . - Determine accuracy ApneaLink Plus score Hypopneas accord 2008 guideline AASM = American Academy Sleep Medcine . - Determine whether patient start stop recorder able attach additional effort sensor use patient instruction sheet
DOC.criteria: Willing give write informed consent Adult patient 18 year age old No alcohol consumption 12 hrs trial period Normally sleep 3 hour per night Unable comprehend write spoken German . Pregnant Patients use Bilevel PAP CPAP therapy PSG Unsuitable inclusion opinion investigator
